heading: PS00063
0: BAGUIO, LA TRINIDAD, IITOGON, SUBLAY, TUBA, TUBLAY DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY (BLISTTDA)
status: Pending with the Committee on GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION since 2016-09-14
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. PS00063
FULL TITLE : BAGUIO, LA TRINIDAD, IITOGON, SUBLAY, TUBA, TUBLAY DEVELOPMENT AUTHORITY (BLISTTDA)
SHORT TITLE : Housing Requirement
ABSTRACT : ... Rep. Go stressed the need to rehabilitate and ensure the progress of Baguio City and its five adjacent municipalities ... Benguet, La Trinidad, Itogon, Sablan, Tuba and Tublay (BLISTT) through the creation of a BLISTT Development Authority (BLISTTDA)...; explained how a once-clean, cosmopolitan, and uncrowded city had become a jungle of congestion, waste, traffic, informal settlements, and an increasing population due to rapid urbanization without a wellprepared development plan...; said that he had filed House Bill No. 1554 seeking the creation of the BLISTTDA ...; relayed to the Body the salient and pertinent provisions of House Bill No. 1554,... stated that the creation of the BLISTTDA offers a road map to bring back the glory days of the said areas adjacent to Baguio City and to achieve a sustainable social and economic growth for the interest and benefit of the people of Baguio City... (House Journal No.20,pp.5-6)
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : GO, MARK O.
DATE FILED : 2016-09-07
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Speech-Privilege Hour
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2016-09-14
